duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage fundraising activities, including cultivation of existing supporters and identifying new funding streams.
Participate in planning annual fundraising event and develop an annual fundraising strategy.
Work with the leadership team and Board to meet or exceed annual fundraising goals and ensure visibility of the organization.
Provide high level support for and coordination of activities related to soliciting interest in the organization, writing grant proposals and reports, and managing funder relationships.
Represent TFN’s mission and vision in meetings with funders, donors, Board members, and the public.
Develop short- and long-term development strategies and create an annual calendar of fundraising activities.
Cultivate current supporters, identify new prospective funding opportunities, and manage all grant proposals and reports.
Be the principal liaison between all funders and TFN leadership/staff and Board members, including organizing meetings.
Utilize CRM software to track donations, steward donors, and ensure all donors are acknowledged and recognized in a timely manner.
Manage Terra Firma National’s relationship with its Board of Directors and assist in the development of a communications strategy.
